segments.source_content: import RemoveGlobalCLI from './\_remove-global-cli.md';

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_a9b642df

segments.source_content: ## Installing dependencies

translations.zh-hant: ## 安裝依賴套件

segments.source_content: You will need Node, Watchman, the React Native command line interface, a JDK, and Android Studio.

translations.zh-hant: 您需要安裝 Node、Watchman、React Native 命令行工具、JDK 以及 Android Studio。

segments.source_content: While you can use any editor of your choice to develop your app, you will need to install Android Studio in order to set up the necessary tooling to build your React Native app for Android.

translations.zh-hant: 雖然您可以選擇任何編輯器來開發應用程式，但必須安裝 Android Studio 才能設置建置 React Native Android 應用所需的工具鏈。

segments.source_content: Node & Watchman

translations.zh-hant: Node & Watchman

segments.source_content: We recommend installing Node and Watchman using [Homebrew](http://brew.sh/). Run the following commands in a Terminal after installing Homebrew:

translations.zh-hant: 建議透過 [Homebrew](http://brew.sh/) 安裝 Node 和 Watchman。安裝 Homebrew 後，在終端機執行以下命令：

segments.source_content:
```shell
brew install node
brew install watchman
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_b9c7a144

segments.source_content: If you have already installed Node on your system, make sure it is Node 14 or newer.

translations.zh-hant: 若系統已安裝 Node，請確認版本為 14 或更新。

segments.source_content: [Watchman](https://facebook.github.io/watchman) is a tool by Facebook for watching changes in the filesystem. It is highly recommended you install it for better performance.

translations.zh-hant: [Watchman](https://facebook.github.io/watchman) 是 Facebook 開發的檔案系統監控工具，強烈建議安裝以提升效能。

segments.source_content: Java Development Kit

translations.zh-hant: Java Development Kit

segments.source_content: We recommend installing the OpenJDK distribution called Azul **Zulu** using [Homebrew](http://brew.sh/). Run the following commands in a Terminal after installing Homebrew:

translations.zh-hant: We recommend installing the OpenJDK distribution called Azul **Zulu** using [Homebrew](http://brew.sh/). Run the following commands in a Terminal after installing Homebrew:

segments.source_content:
```shell
brew install --cask zulu@11

# Get path to where cask was installed to double-click installer
brew info --cask zulu@11
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_a89b882e

segments.source_content: After you install the JDK, update your `JAVA_HOME` environment variable. If you used above steps, JDK will likely be at `/Library/Java/JavaVirtualMachines/zulu-11.jdk/Contents/Home`

translations.zh-hant: 安裝 JDK 後，請更新 `JAVA_HOME` 環境變數。若依上述步驟安裝，JDK 路徑通常為 `/Library/Java/JavaVirtualMachines/zulu-11.jdk/Contents/Home`

segments.source_content: The Zulu OpenJDK distribution offers JDKs for **both Intel and M1 Macs**. This will make sure your builds are faster on M1 Macs compared to using an Intel-based JDK.

translations.zh-hant: Zulu OpenJDK 發行版提供 **Intel 和 M1 晶片 Mac 專用**的 JDK，可確保在 M1 Mac 上獲得比 Intel 版 JDK 更快的建置速度。

segments.source_content: If you have already installed JDK on your system, we recommend JDK 11. You may encounter problems using higher JDK versions.

translations.zh-hant: 若系統已安裝 JDK，建議使用 JDK 11 版本。使用更高版本可能會遇到相容性問題。

segments.source_content: Android development environment

translations.zh-hant: Android development environment

segments.source_content: Setting up your development environment can be somewhat tedious if you're new to Android development. If you're already familiar with Android development, there are a few things you may need to configure. In either case, please make sure to carefully follow the next few steps.

translations.zh-hant: 對於 Android 開發新手來說，設置開發環境可能較為繁瑣。若您已有 Android 開發經驗，則只需進行部分配置。無論如何，請仔細遵循後續步驟。

segments.source_content: 1. Install Android Studio

translations.zh-hant: 1. Install Android Studio

segments.source_content: [Download and install Android Studio](https://developer.android.com/studio/index.html). While on Android Studio installation wizard, make sure the boxes next to all of the following items are checked:

translations.zh-hant: [下載並安裝 Android Studio](https://developer.android.com/studio/index.html)。在安裝精靈中，請確保勾選以下所有項目：

segments.source_content:
- `Android SDK`
- `Android SDK Platform`
- `Android Virtual Device`

translations.zh-hant:
- `Android SDK`
- `Android SDK Platform`
- `Android Virtual Device`

segments.source_content: Then, click "Next" to install all of these components.

translations.zh-hant: 接著點擊「Next」安裝所有元件。

segments.source_content: > If the checkboxes are grayed out, you will have a chance to install these components later on.

translations.zh-hant: > 若選項呈灰色不可勾選，後續仍可安裝這些元件。

segments.source_content: Once setup has finalized and you're presented with the Welcome screen, proceed to the next step.

translations.zh-hant: 完成安裝並顯示歡迎畫面後，請繼續下一步。

segments.source_content: 2. Install the Android SDK

translations.zh-hant: 2. Install the Android SDK

segments.source_content: Android Studio installs the latest Android SDK by default. Building a React Native app with native code, however, requires the `Android 12 (S)` SDK in particular. Additional Android SDKs can be installed through the SDK Manager in Android Studio.

translations.zh-hant: Android Studio 預設會安裝最新版 Android SDK。但使用原生碼建置 React Native 應用需特定安裝 `Android 12 (S)` SDK，可透過 Android Studio 的 SDK 管理員安裝其他版本。

segments.source_content: To do that, open Android Studio, click on "More Actions" button and select "SDK Manager".

translations.zh-hant: 開啟 Android Studio 後，點擊「More Actions」按鈕並選擇「SDK Manager」。

segments.source_content: ![Android Studio Welcome](/docs/assets/GettingStartedAndroidStudioWelcomeMacOS.png)

translations.zh-hant: ![Android Studio 歡迎畫面](/docs/assets/GettingStartedAndroidStudioWelcomeMacOS.png)

segments.source_content: > The SDK Manager can also be found within the Android Studio "Settings" dialog, under **Languages & Frameworks** → **Android SDK**.

translations.zh-hant: > 也可在 Android Studio 的「Settings」對話框中找到 SDK Manager，路徑為 **Languages & Frameworks** → **Android SDK**。

segments.source_content: Select the "SDK Platforms" tab from within the SDK Manager, then check the box next to "Show Package Details" in the bottom right corner. Look for and expand the `Android 12 (S)` entry, then make sure the following items are checked:

translations.zh-hant: 在 SDK Manager 中選擇「SDK Platforms」標籤頁，勾選右下角的「Show Package Details」。找到並展開 `Android 12 (S)` 項目，確認以下元件已勾選：

segments.source_content:
- `Android SDK Platform 31`
- `Intel x86 Atom_64 System Image` or `Google APIs Intel x86 Atom System Image` or (for Apple M1 Silicon) `Google APIs ARM 64 v8a System Image`

translations.zh-hant:
- `Android SDK Platform 31`
- `Intel x86 Atom_64 System Image` or `Google APIs Intel x86 Atom System Image` or (for Apple M1 Silicon) `Google APIs ARM 64 v8a System Image`

segments.source_content: Next, select the "SDK Tools" tab and check the box next to "Show Package Details" here as well. Look for and expand the "Android SDK Build-Tools" entry, then make sure that `31.0.0` is selected.

translations.zh-hant: 接著，切換至「SDK Tools」標籤頁，同樣勾選「顯示套件詳細資訊」。找到並展開「Android SDK Build-Tools」項目，確保已選取 `31.0.0` 版本。

segments.source_content: Finally, click "Apply" to download and install the Android SDK and related build tools.

translations.zh-hant: 最後點擊「Apply」按鈕以下載並安裝 Android SDK 及相關建置工具。

segments.source_content: 3. Configure the ANDROID_SDK_ROOT environment variable

translations.zh-hant: 3. Configure the ANDROID_SDK_ROOT environment variable

segments.source_content: The React Native tools require some environment variables to be set up in order to build apps with native code.

translations.zh-hant: React Native 工具需要設定某些環境變數才能建置包含原生代碼的應用程式。

segments.source_content: Add the following lines to your `$HOME/.bash_profile` or `$HOME/.bashrc` (if you are using `zsh` then `~/.zprofile` or `~/.zshrc`) config file:

translations.zh-hant: 請將以下內容加入您的 `$HOME/.bash_profile` 或 `$HOME/.bashrc` 設定檔（若使用 `zsh` 則為 `~/.zprofile` 或 `~/.zshrc`）：

segments.source_content:
```shell
export ANDROID_SDK_ROOT=$HOME/Library/Android/sdk
export PATH=$PATH:$ANDROID_SDK_ROOT/emulator
export PATH=$PATH:$ANDROID_SDK_ROOT/platform-tools
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_a716abf2

segments.source_content: > `.bash_profile` is specific to `bash`. If you're using another shell, you will need to edit the appropriate shell-specific config file.

translations.zh-hant: > `.bash_profile` 是 `bash` 專用的設定檔。若使用其他 shell，需編輯對應的 shell 設定檔。

segments.source_content: Type `source $HOME/.bash_profile` for `bash` or `source $HOME/.zprofile` to load the config into your current shell. Verify that ANDROID_SDK_ROOT has been set by running `echo $ANDROID_SDK_ROOT` and the appropriate directories have been added to your path by running `echo $PATH`.

translations.zh-hant: Type `source $HOME/.bash_profile` for `bash` or `source $HOME/.zprofile` to load the config into your current shell. Verify that ANDROID_SDK_ROOT has been set by running `echo $ANDROID_SDK_ROOT` and the appropriate directories have been added to your path by running `echo $PATH`.

segments.source_content: > Please make sure you use the correct Android SDK path. You can find the actual location of the SDK in the Android Studio "Settings" dialog, under **Languages & Frameworks** → **Android SDK**.

translations.zh-hant: > 請務必使用正確的 Android SDK 路徑。您可以在 Android Studio 的「Settings」對話框中，透過 **Languages & Frameworks** → **Android SDK** 找到 SDK 的實際位置。

segments.source_content: React Native Command Line Interface

translations.zh-hant: React Native Command Line Interface

segments.source_content: React Native has a built-in command line interface. Rather than install and manage a specific version of the CLI globally, we recommend you access the current version at runtime using `npx`, which ships with Node.js. With `npx react-native <command>`, the current stable version of the CLI will be downloaded and executed at the time the command is run.

translations.zh-hant: React Native 內建命令列介面。我們建議透過 Node.js 自帶的 `npx` 工具在執行時存取當前版本，而非全域安裝特定 CLI 版本。使用 `npx react-native <command>` 時，系統會自動下載並執行最新穩定版的 CLI。

segments.source_content: Creating a new application

translations.zh-hant: Creating a new application

segments.source_content: <RemoveGlobalCLI />

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_45444c80

segments.source_content: React Native has a built-in command line interface, which you can use to generate a new project. You can access it without installing anything globally using `npx`, which ships with Node.js. Let's create a new React Native project called "AwesomeProject":

translations.zh-hant: React Native 內建命令列介面可用於生成新專案。您無需全域安裝任何套件，直接透過 Node.js 自帶的 `npx` 工具即可使用。以下示範建立名為「AwesomeProject」的新專案：

segments.source_content:
```shell
npx react-native init AwesomeProject
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_1cf51900

segments.source_content: This is not necessary if you are integrating React Native into an existing application, or if you've installed [Expo](https://docs.expo.dev/bare/installing-expo-modules/) in your project, or if you're adding Android support to an existing React Native project (see [Integration with Existing Apps](integration-with-existing-apps.md)). You can also use a third-party CLI to init your React Native app, such as [Ignite CLI](https://github.com/infinitered/ignite).

translations.zh-hant: 若您要將 React Native 整合至現有應用程式、專案中已安裝 [Expo](https://docs.expo.dev/bare/installing-expo-modules/)，或為現有 React Native 專案添加 Android 支援（參見[與現有應用程式整合](integration-with-existing-apps.md)），則無需此步驟。您也可使用第三方 CLI（如 [Ignite CLI](https://github.com/infinitered/ignite)）初始化專案。

segments.source_content: [Optional] Using a specific version or template

translations.zh-hant: [Optional] Using a specific version or template

segments.source_content: If you want to start a new project with a specific React Native version, you can use the `--version` argument:

translations.zh-hant: 若要使用特定 React Native 版本建立專案，可加入 `--version` 參數：

segments.source_content:
```shell
npx react-native init AwesomeProject --version X.XX.X
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_99070903

segments.source_content: You can also start a project with a custom React Native template, like TypeScript, with `--template` argument:

translations.zh-hant: 您也可透過 `--template` 參數使用自訂模板（如 TypeScript）建立專案：

segments.source_content:
```shell
npx react-native init AwesomeTSProject --template react-native-template-typescript
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_353ca453

segments.source_content: Preparing the Android device

translations.zh-hant: Preparing the Android device

segments.source_content: You will need an Android device to run your React Native Android app. This can be either a physical Android device, or more commonly, you can use an Android Virtual Device which allows you to emulate an Android device on your computer.

translations.zh-hant: 執行 React Native Android 應用程式需準備 Android 裝置，可以是實體裝置或透過 Android 虛擬裝置 (AVD) 在電腦上模擬。

segments.source_content: Either way, you will need to prepare the device to run Android apps for development.

translations.zh-hant: 無論採用何種方式，均需將裝置設定為開發模式以執行 Android 應用程式。

segments.source_content: Using a physical device

translations.zh-hant: Using a physical device

segments.source_content: If you have a physical Android device, you can use it for development in place of an AVD by plugging it in to your computer using a USB cable and following the instructions [here](running-on-device.md).

translations.zh-hant: 如果您擁有實體 Android 裝置，可以透過 USB 線連接電腦後，依照[此處說明](running-on-device.md)將其用作開發環境來取代 AVD。

segments.source_content: Using a virtual device

translations.zh-hant: Using a virtual device

segments.source_content: If you use Android Studio to open `./AwesomeProject/android`, you can see the list of available Android Virtual Devices (AVDs) by opening the "AVD Manager" from within Android Studio. Look for an icon that looks like this:

translations.zh-hant: 若使用 Android Studio 開啟 `./AwesomeProject/android` 專案，可透過點選 Android Studio 內的「AVD Manager」圖示（如下所示）查看可用虛擬裝置清單：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_3d0666e5

segments.source_content: If you have recently installed Android Studio, you will likely need to [create a new AVD](https://developer.android.com/studio/run/managing-avds.html). Select "Create Virtual Device...", then pick any Phone from the list and click "Next", then select the **S** API Level 31 image.

translations.zh-hant: 若剛安裝 Android Studio，您可能需要[建立新 AVD](https://developer.android.com/studio/run/managing-avds.html)。選擇「Create Virtual Device...」後，從清單任選手機型號點擊「Next」，接著選取 **S** API Level 31 系統映像檔。

segments.source_content: Click "Next" then "Finish" to create your AVD. At this point you should be able to click on the green triangle button next to your AVD to launch it, then proceed to the next step.

translations.zh-hant: 點擊「Next」後按「Finish」完成 AVD 建立。此時點擊 AVD 旁的綠色三角形按鈕即可啟動模擬器，並繼續後續步驟。

segments.source_content: Running your React Native application

translations.zh-hant: Running your React Native application

segments.source_content: Step 1: Start Metro

translations.zh-hant: Step 1: Start Metro

segments.source_content: First, you will need to start Metro, the JavaScript bundler that ships with React Native. Metro "takes in an entry file and various options, and returns a single JavaScript file that includes all your code and its dependencies."—[Metro Docs](https://metrobundler.dev/docs/concepts)

translations.zh-hant: First, you will need to start Metro, the JavaScript bundler that ships with React Native. Metro "takes in an entry file and various options, and returns a single JavaScript file that includes all your code and its dependencies."—[Metro Docs](https://metrobundler.dev/docs/concepts)

segments.source_content: To start Metro, run `npx react-native start` inside your React Native project folder:

translations.zh-hant: To start Metro, run `npx react-native start` inside your React Native project folder:

segments.source_content:
```shell
npx react-native start
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_3ad9440a

segments.source_content: `react-native start` starts Metro Bundler.

translations.zh-hant: `react-native start` 指令會啟動 Metro 打包工具。

segments.source_content: > If you use the Yarn package manager, you can use `yarn` instead of `npx` when running React Native commands inside an existing project.

translations.zh-hant: > 若使用 Yarn 套件管理器，在既有專案中執行 React Native 指令時可用 `yarn` 取代 `npx`。

segments.source_content: > If you're familiar with web development, Metro is a lot like webpack—for React Native apps. Unlike Kotlin or Java, JavaScript isn't compiled—and neither is React Native. Bundling isn't the same as compiling, but it can help improve startup performance and translate some platform-specific JavaScript into more widely supported JavaScript.

translations.zh-hant: > 熟悉網頁開發者可以將 Metro 視為 React Native 的 webpack。不同於 Kotlin 或 Java，JavaScript 與 React Native 皆不需編譯。打包雖不等同於編譯，但能提升啟動效能並將部分平台專用 JavaScript 轉換為通用格式。

segments.source_content: Step 2: Start your application

translations.zh-hant: Step 2: Start your application

segments.source_content: Let Metro Bundler run in its own terminal. Open a new terminal inside your React Native project folder. Run the following:

translations.zh-hant: 讓 Metro 打包工具在獨立終端機運行，另開新終端機進入專案目錄後執行：

segments.source_content:
```shell
npx react-native run-android
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_71779666

segments.source_content: If everything is set up correctly, you should see your new app running in your Android emulator shortly.

translations.zh-hant: 若設定正確，稍後即可在 Android 模擬器中看見新應用程式運行。

segments.source_content: ![AwesomeProject on Android](/docs/assets/GettingStartedAndroidSuccessMacOS.png)

translations.zh-hant: ![Android 上的 AwesomeProject](/docs/assets/GettingStartedAndroidSuccessMacOS.png)

segments.source_content: `npx react-native run-android` is one way to run your app - you can also run it directly from within Android Studio.

translations.zh-hant: `npx react-native run-android` 是執行應用程式的方式之一，您亦可直接透過 Android Studio 運行。

segments.source_content: > If you can't get this to work, see the [Troubleshooting](troubleshooting.md) page.

translations.zh-hant: > 若執行失敗，請參閱[疑難排解頁面](troubleshooting.md)。

segments.source_content: Modifying your app

translations.zh-hant: Modifying your app

segments.source_content: Now that you have successfully run the app, let's modify it.

translations.zh-hant: 成功運行應用程式後，現在開始修改：

segments.source_content:
- Open `App.js` in your text editor of choice and edit some lines.
- Press the `R` key twice or select `Reload` from the Developer Menu (`⌘M`) to see your changes!

translations.zh-hant:
- Open `App.js` in your text editor of choice and edit some lines.
- Press the `R` key twice or select `Reload` from the Developer Menu (`⌘M`) to see your changes!

segments.source_content: That's it!

translations.zh-hant: That's it!

segments.source_content: Congratulations! You've successfully run and modified your first React Native app.

translations.zh-hant: 恭喜！您已成功運行並修改第一個 React Native 應用程式。
@@untranslatable_placeholder_e32234e6

segments.source_content: Now what?

translations.zh-hant: Now what?

segments.source_content: - If you want to add this new React Native code to an existing application, check out the [Integration guide](integration-with-existing-apps.md).

translations.zh-hant: - If you want to add this new React Native code to an existing application, check out the [Integration guide](integration-with-existing-apps.md).

segments.source_content: If you're curious to learn more about React Native, check out the [Introduction to React Native](getting-started).

translations.zh-hant: 若想深入學習 React Native，請查看[React Native 簡介](getting-started)。
